page.title: 03A Typical School Day
page.content: Hellifield County Primary School starts at 9.15am. for the 59 pupils. Most of us walk to school, but children from outlying farms come in cars. Ages range from 4.5 to 10 years. In our class after reading, we have a recorder lesson, then assembly or singing in the hall. After playtime in the yard (on the field in summer), we do writing and art. Some work at the computer. The bell goes at 12.15pm. for dinner.Some of us bring packed lunches,but most eat school dinners cooked at Settle High School. In the afternoon we do maths, topic work and science until 2.40pm. After play we have P.E. or story until home-time. Gymnastics Club is after school.
